group_1.narration: Since that day, I poured my heart@and soul into the pursuit of cooking.

group_1.textRight: Wha? Did we always have all this@cookware? What's going on?!
I know you're in charge of the budget,@Konoha, but are we doing okay for cash?

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry. These were all very cheap, less@than 3% of this month's budget in all.
Though we might have to skip snacks@for a day to cover the cost.
I got us a set of three cooking knives@and all six sizes of measuring spoons.
Six bowls, including a colander!@A peeler, a utility knife, a grater...
Adding them to what we already had, we@should have just enough.
I've also been studying culinary theory@textbooks...

group_1.textRight: [chara:302701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Culinary theory? But I've never studied@anything like that!

group_1.textLeft: "Considering the interplay of flavors will@create synergy via contrast and constraint."
"Opt for textures that please the palate."
"The impact of color choice"... Dark,@molasses-brown piques the appetite.
If I meet all these requirements, I'm bound@to craft something delectable!

group_1.textRight: I-is that really what makes for good@cooking, though...?

group_1.textLeft: Hazuki, you've got a natural-born talent@when it comes to food preparation.
You can cook at your present level@without studying any theory at all.
But me... I'm not blessed with that@talent.

group_1.textRight: Well, I dunno if I'd say I'm a "natural"@but...
It's true you don't really have any@kind of innate skill at cooking...
[chara:302701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh! S-sorry!

group_1.textLeft: No, you're right. But that's precisely@why...
I must seize this opportunity and give it@my all!

group_1.textRight: (Man... I kinda feel like she might do it!)
Konoha, I'll eat whatever you make today!

group_1.textLeft: Really?![chara:302601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302601:motion_000][chara:302601:motion_100][chara:302601:cheek_0][chara:302601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302601:lipSynch_1] Thank you! I won't let you down!
All right, then!
I'll start by aiming for "contrast". Mixing@salt in with sugar should do it...

group_1.textCenter: There! All finished! Super sweet bonito@omelets!
I dyed them with purple yams so, by@coating them in red ketchup...
I got this brilliant brown color! They're@topped with sugar-stewed cauliflower.
The eggs contain a mix of textures,@so they're both fluffy and crunchy in turn.
And the dash of Worcestershire sauce@around the plate hints at French cuisine!
Beautiful... A truly perfect dish. I used@every last theory of good cuisine.

group_1.textRight: (Ohhh...noooooo! I gotta make a break@for it!)

group_1.textLeft: This is my first time preparing a meal@with such research and preparation...
Hazuki, have you ever put this much effort@into a dish before?

group_1.textRight: Hmm, I dunno...
Just wondering, but, did you, uh, taste@test this...at any point?

group_1.textLeft: Oh yes, I tasted every ingredient.

group_1.textRight: [chara:302701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock](So that means you have no idea what@they taste like together!)

group_1.textLeft: Well, let's enjoy our meal!

group_1.textRight: [chara:302701:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: With this, I bid farewell to the old me@who could cook nothing!

group_1.textRight: (And I bid farewell to the world...)

group_1.textLeft: Here we go!

group_1.textRight: [chara:302701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
*Collapse*

group_1.textCenter: [chara:302601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]H-Hazuki?! It couldn't have been that bad...
How did I manage to make something this@putrid and vile?

group_1.textRight: I'm back, I'm back! Konoha, lookie here!@Looooook!

group_1.textLeft: A flyer for a...cooking class? A teacher@will instruct participants on how to cook?

group_1.textRight: Mhmm, mhmm! I thought maybe you couldâ€”@[chara:302801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302801:motion_000][chara:302801:motion_400][chara:302801:cheek_0][chara:302801:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:302801:lipSynch_1][chara:302801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]And...Hazuki's out for the count!
Ohhh nooo![chara:302801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302801:cheek_0][chara:302801:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302801:lipSynch_1] I was too late...
